data.eml:eml: New or little known taxa of the plant bug tribe Hallodapini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae) from Thailand, with descriptions of three new species of the genus Acrorrhinium Noualhier

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Yamada, Kazutaka, Artchawakom, Taksin (2013): New or little known taxa of the plant bug tribe Hallodapini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae) from Thailand, with descriptions of three new species of the genus Acrorrhinium Noualhier. Zootaxa 3647 (3): 429-442, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3647.3.2
